casebody.data:
John P. Moffett, Jr. v. J. William Burns, Commissioner of Transportation (7525)

Dupont, C. J., Stoughton and Norcott, Js.

Argued May 9 decision released May 17, 1989 James K. Smith, with whom, on the brief, was Robert J. Guendelsberger, for the appellant (plaintiff). Louis B. Blumenfeld, with whom was Joseph A. LaBella and, on the brief, Richard A. Ferris, for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

There is no error.
